systemGeneralClasses

Class VariableLengthCommandValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • systemGeneralClasses.VariableLengthCommandValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandValidator

    public class VariableLengthCommandValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandValidator
    This defines a command validator type. These type of validators are used for those commands with a complex grammar in which the number of tokens in the operand value is variable. For example: a list expression, etc. For such type of command it holds the appropriate operand analyzers as the members of an internal list. These are used to properly analyze the operands that the user includes in a particular command instance of a system command to which the CommandValidator is assigned to.
    Author:
    Prof. Pedro I. Rivera Vega
